item.title: Back to Basics â€” A MillMint Blog
item.description: The way I’m doing things now isn’t working – I don’t enjoy social media, or marketing my work. I haven’t done much to grow my audience these last few years. And I’m surrounded by unfinished projects; difficult and wonderful things that refuse to move. 2022 is the end of the COVID era for me. I’m moving house again, moving around again (ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡­ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡ª). These are all good things. I’m healthier when I’m learning, and I’ve learned a lot these last couple months.
